ESDS Government</AuthEnty>         <othId>The <i>Health Survey for England</i> (HSE) is funded by the NHS Information Centre; earlier years were funded by the Department of Health.<br> <br> The dataset was created as part of a project examining obesity. Collaborators on this project were Professor Iain Buchan, University of Manchester, Andrew Renehan, University of Manchester and Matthew Sperrin, University of Lancaster.<br> <br> The HSE data collection was carried out by the Office of Population Censuses and Surveys (OPCS) in the early years and NatCen/Royal Free in later years.</othId>       </rspStmt>       <prodStmt>         <copyright>Crown copyright material is reproduced with the permission of the Controller of HMSO and the Queen's Printer for Scotland</copyright>       </prodStmt>       <distStmt>         <distrbtr>UK Data Service</distrbtr>         <depositr>Higgins, V., University of Manchester.
